heading: Versace: That's what's behind the new 2024 watch summer collection
content: The 44 x 41.5 mm watch is made of titanium and has three quartz hands. There are four screws on the square bezel. The dial shows the well-known 3D Greca pattern, which can also be found on the bracelet. The same Greca pattern and Medusa head adorn the 12 o'clock position of the Versace Antares. The Versace logo is depicted at the 6 o'clock position of the 10.3 mm thick watch. It will be available from February 2024 at select Versace boutiques and authorized retailers in Sunray Gray and Green .
author: Von Simone Lo Bartolo

heading: Porsche announces a 911 hybrid model for summer 2024
content: The 992.2 generation Porsche 911, due to launch in mid-2024, receives a number of revisions, including subtly changed exterior design, a revised interior and updated six-cylinder petrol engines. However, the 911's most significant update in its sixth decade of production is the introduction of a unique gasoline-electric hybrid system. This represents an optimized version of Porsche's turbocharged six-cylinder engine with a specially developed electric motor integrated into the front axle. The combustion engine drives the rear wheels, while the electric motor activates the front wheels.The new 400-volt system is intended to generate its own energy reserves by having the motor act as a generator and using brake regeneration to make external charging unnecessary. (Also interesting: Bugatti announces the successor to the Chiron - the teaser provides this information about the supercar )
author: From GQ.de

heading: The Air Jordan 1 x Travis Scott Low OG “Olive” is already the new trend shoe for 2025
content: Recently, the rumors about the upcoming release were confirmed by images published by “Knowing Kicks”. A site for sneakerheads that shares images of announced models before the official release, which are apparently sent to it by insiders.Although the collaboration is called Olive, you could actually say that it is a Reverse Medium Olive. Because the shoe is similar to the release from a year ago, where the color scheme was reversed. The sneakers were sold out within seconds. (Also interesting: JJJound x Adidas Samba: This collaboration brings a breath of fresh air to the sneaker scene )
author: Von Guillermina Carro

heading: The Nike Air Max DN will undoubtedly become one of the most important silhouettes for Nike this year.
content: Karsten Ranitzsch is the “Head of Coffee” at Nespresso and as such is responsible, among other things, for all new products that the company brings onto the market. His latest masterpiece is the Arabica variety “N°20”, a coffee that has a particularly deep and balanced taste, which shows its greatest strengths when enjoyed straight as espresso and which is now available for purchase for a limited time. We spoke to Karsten Ranitzsch about coffee – and about the most famous face in the Nespresso family, brand ambassador George Clooney. (Also read: Is coffee healthy? This is how many cups you should drink per day )
author: By Mathias Ottmann

heading: Elon Musk is no longer the richest man in the world – he is losing his place to...
content: Amazon CEO Jeff Bezos's net worth has risen to a staggering $200 billion, surpassing Elon Musk's $198 billion. This shift represents a significant reversal of the situation. While Jeff Bezos has gained $23 billion since the most recent ranking, Elon Musk has suffered a frightening loss of $31 billion (28.5 billion euros) in recent months. This is primarily due to a significant drop in Tesla shares, which fell by over seven percent on Monday. The reason: Tesla sales fell in China in February 2024 during the Chinese New Year holiday. (Also interesting: Bill Gates reveals the smartest investment you can make in your life )
author: From GQ.de

heading: Look Younger: Which Foods You Should Eat Now – According to Experts
content: The so-called “Blue Zones” are regions of the world where people live longer on average. These include Okinawa in Japan, Sardinia in Italy, the Nicoya Peninsula in Costa Rica, Ikaria in Greece and the Seventh-day Adventist Community in Loma Linda, California. These zones were identified by Dan Buettner and first discussed in “National Geographic” in 2005. According to Buettner, the people who live there have certain habits that enable them to live healthier - and therefore longer - lives. This also includes nutrition.In fact, the different nutrients contained in food have different effects on the body, the brain, our skin - and therefore also on the aging process.
author: Paloma Gonzalez

heading: Best games: These are the 10 coolest single-player games of all time
content: In the world of single-player gaming, there exists an elite whose influence transcends the boundaries of pixels and screens. This carefully curated selection aims to represent 10 of the best works from decades of video game history; a fusion of aesthetics, technology and storytelling.
author: Von Simone Lo Bartolo
